kpi_info.title: RG Average CPU Load
kpi_info.use: The current CPU usage at recovery group (RG) level in percent (within 0 and 100 with values rounded to the next integer) during the 30 seconds period before the sample was taken. The measured period is less than 30 seconds if operators requested a counter snapshot using NE-local interfaces within the time frame. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the CPU-load is increased or decreased. The data is updated on a per-Recovery Group level.
